thread.title: Elisabeth Suter

author: Elisabeth Suter
title: Elisabeth Suter
text: I was not happy that it fid not deliver to the home in the destination... but i am verry glad and thankfull how fast and good i always reseved answers and how amazing and beautifull my order went into reality when they made it... the one that i send it to really really was sooo exidet and i really in total am verry satisfyed and want to use zChocolat again in the futer... :-))
